Package com.android

Class Howler

java.lang.Object
com.android.Primate
com.android.Howler
class Howler
extends Primate
only howlers and subclasses of Howlers will have a tail, so Howlers and sub classes of Howlers will have a HAS-A relationship with the myTail Attribute To see video tutorial for this section of code Video tutorial For all 177 videos, which cover all the topics in this course go to Complete Course Video Tutorial

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) boolean hasTail
    a check to if this Howler has an existing tail, if false a new one will be created
    private Tail myTail
    the tail object every howler should have

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Howler​(boolean hasTail)
    constructor for the Howler class, which takes a boolean, if true, no new tail needs to be created if false a new tail will be created and assigned to myTail atribute

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • hasTail

      boolean hasTail
      a check to if this Howler has an existing tail, if false a new one will be created

    • myTail

      private Tail myTail
      the tail object every howler should have
